call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Community Chat - October 16th

decisions.decision: Next meetup will be at AnarkoPulco conference in Acapulco in late February
decisions.speaker: Kushti
decisions.context: Planning next year's community meetup location
decisions.quote: Acapulco. So it's the late February AnarkoPulco conference.

commitments.commitment: Put silvercents document in the Chain Cash repo
commitments.quote: I'm going to put silvercents document in the Chain Cash repo, if you agreed on that.

commitments.commitment: Have a chat with Lutz about AnarkoPulco conference
commitments.quote: Let's see. So let's have a chat with Lutz or the telegram.

commitments.commitment: Merge silver oracle code into the oracle pool implementation
commitments.quote: in the Gold Oracle Group, we had discussions just yesterday or today. depending on a time zone, merging silver oracle code into the oracle pool implementation

open_questions.question: Understanding why silvercents documentation is incomplete and what details are missing
open_questions.context: Kushti wants to understand gaps in Grayman's silvercents proposal

open_questions.question: How to bootstrap liquidity for Dexy Silver or Gleon Silver
open_questions.context: Need to launch silver-backed stablecoins after oracle implementation

key_facts.fact: Machina Finance can handle minimum 3,601 transactions and maximum 16,000 transactions
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Approximately $15 billion worth of silver tokens are already spread around the US
key_facts.speaker: Grayman

key_facts.fact: $100 face value silver costs around $3,300 from coin shops
key_facts.speaker: Grayman

key_facts.fact: Three countries were represented at the Colorado meetup
